participant_1.background:
I once met a man i still believe was a vampire.
I sometimes spend too much money at the casino.
My mom is a palm reader in new orleans.
My favorite food is shrimp.

participant_2.background:
I donate any overstock to charity.
I am a couponed.
I love to save money.
I like to keep my stockpile organised.

content.text: What are some of your hobbies?
I love to coupon and save money.
That's great! I love to coupon too. I've been able to save a lot of money by doing it.
Me too! I love being able to get things I need for a fraction of the price.
What's your favorite thing to coupon for?
I love to coupon for food and household items. I can always find great deals on things I need to buy anyway.
Me too! I love being able to save money on my grocery bill.
I also love to coupon for clothes and other items. I can find some really great deals on things I would normally never buy.
That's great! I love being able to find a good deal on something I want.
What's your favorite way to use coupons?
I love to use coupons for online shopping. I can find some really great deals on things I want to buy.
Me too! I love being able to get things I want for a fraction of the price.
What's your favorite thing about couponing?
I love being able to save money and get things I need and want.
Me too! I love being able to save money and stretch my budget.
I also love being able to help others. I donate any overstock to charity.
That's great! I love that you're able to help others.
